channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OpenAI has upped its lobbying efforts nearly sevenfold

item.title: Tencent introduces ‘Hunyuan3D 2.0,’ AI that speeds up 3D design from days to seconds
item.description: Tencent's Hunyuan3D 2.0 transforms images into detailed 3D models in seconds. This could reshape how industries create virtual content.

item.title: For federal workers, Trump’s return-to-office order amounts to an unwelcome pay cut
item.description: The approaching return to full-time in-person work will cost remote and hybrid workers hundreds, if not thousands, of dollars per year.

item.title: ‘We are shocked and upset’: My mother died and her second husband said he now owns everything. Is this true?
item.description: “My husband and I tolerated him, but overall we never got close to him.”
